data.enText: a person who has the legal right to receive sb's property, money or title when that person dies
to be heir to a large fortune
the heir to the throne (= the person who will be the next king or queen)

data.chText: （工作或传统的）继承者，承袭者，传人
data.enText: a person who is thought to continue the work or a tradition started by sb else

data.text: Use an , not a , before heir .

means: (工作或传统的)继承者，承袭者，传人

tr: a person who is entitled by law or by the terms of a will to inherit the estate of another
a person who inherits some title or office

value.def: An heir is someone who has the right to inherit a person's money, property, or title when that person dies.

example.ex: His heir, Lord Doune, cuts a bit of a dash in the city.
example.tran: 他的继承人杜恩勋爵在城里出了一番风头。

gramarinfo.label: oft with poss, oft N <l>to</l> n

trans: 当然继承人；法定继承人；(职位的)确定接替者；确定接班者

partsOfSpeech.dec: heir 继承 + ess 表女性 → 女继承人
heir 继承 + ship 表资格 → 继承权
heredit〔= hered〕继承 + able 可…的 → 可继承的，可遗传的
heredit〔= hered〕继承 + ary …的 → 世袭的，遗传的
